reviews.review: Do yourself a favor, don't get this game. Trust me you will thank me. Sadly I spent money on this dog-ass game.

#DeadByBoycott The attempt of a boycott is currently underway for Dead by Daylight. For the next 3 months we are going to cease all sales, and stop buying everything BHVR releases. This includes cosmetics, rifts, and the next Chapter. BHVR has treated the health of the game poorly and ignored the community for the past 2 years, with it only getting worse and worse. If you are reading this and want DBD, wait for the next 3 months before you get it, and check in to see if anything has changed.

Wanted to be a slasher villan, got to be a slasher villan and scare all the people.

Listen, for all its bugs and issues it is still hands down one of the most unique games you will ever play.  I am not gonna go over each little detail but, I will say this.  Buy the game and play it.  If you have a good head on your shoulders you will at least agree this game is unique.  Good Luck.

Edit: 11/2019 - Game is still holding strong in my book, lots of fun with friends and the devs are still continually releasing content.  Dedicated servers are live (not the greatest but live).  The game is continuing to improve.

P.S.  Youtube is a great resource for tips and pointers.

Good game.
Less bugs. 
Still bad ranking came back after a break to be rank 20 killer and rank 20 survivor, I know I probably don't play at the same level as I did before I took a break but to put a regular rank 1 killer and survivor against low mmr players is not fair. I'm currently rank 6 no perk no addon huntress (I didn't play huntress much b4 Oni main) and still getting 4k almost every game. and I know I've been playing this game for a reasonable time ranks don't mean skill but still it's still not fair for new players to get rolled by returning players. 
Apart from that I like the graphic update they did makes it easier to see blendettes. 
Not a perfect game yet but much better than what it was before.
Now maybe making over viable meta's for players to use at red ranks instead of Adrenaline, DS, Dead heart, spine chill or any other second chance perk, same thing for killers everyone running same 3 killers with BBQ, Devour hope, ruin. makes the game pretty boring in terms of diversity

Невероятная и крутая игра, с огромным количеством добра и любви.

Здесь есть и школьники которые с удовольствием позаботятся о твоей ротовой полости, так же они предложат поухаживать за твоей матерью.

А ещё они любят жаловаться и плакать когда ты рвешь их маленькие жопы, говоря:
О а ты ноед берешь фууууу, ой а ты кемпешь фуууууу, ой а ты тунелишь фуууууу

Я так скажу тем кто на маньяках играет, не обращайте внимания на таких животных.

Запомни ты играешь в игру так как хочется тебе, главное не делать того что запрещено разработчиками, а всё остальное как хочешь!

Так же тут есть и адекватные личности с кем я познакомился, и стримеров много, последнее время игра стала слишком популярна и очень много консольщиков рвут мой зад, они вообще не умеют или не хотят уметь играть даже на 1-х рангах.

Они прячутся как будто играют в хоррор :D сукаааааа
Допишу как нибудь . . . спасибо за прочтение, по прежнему хороша!
